item.title: 🐘 Hosteroid/domain-monitor (52 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Hosteroid

📝 Repository: Hosteroid/domain-monitor

📄 Descrizione: A self-hosted PHP domain expiration monitoring tool that tracks domain expiry dates, RDAP/WHOIS data, and SSL certificate validity. Supports alerts, multi-user setup, and cron automation. Built for developers, hosting providers, and IT admins who want full control without third-party services.

⭐ Stelle: 52

🍴 Forks: 9

💻 Linguaggio: PHP

🏷️ Topics: domain-expiration domain-management domain-management-system domain-monitor domain-monitoring domain-monitoring-and-alerting domain-tracker open-source php8 rdap rdap-protocol rdap-service self-hosted whois whois-information whois-lookup whois-service

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-10-08T11:10:24Z
